long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an Hour Summary section to a players BattleMetrics page, which shows the following: 
- Total number of hours a player has on servers tracked by BattleMetrics
- Previous usernames on servers tracked by BattleMetrics
- Estimated time played on servers tracked by BattleMetrics in the previous 2 weeks

For more information visit: https://github.com/jxtt-dev/battlemetrics_hour_summary
